lead_paragraph: The Associated Press and other media outlets urged a judge Tuesday to grant access to police videos made shortly after pop singer Justin Bieber's arrest last month on driving under the influence and other charges.

headline.main: AP, Others Seek Access to Bieber Arrest Video
headline.print_headline: AP, Others Seek Access to Bieber Arrest Video

snippet: The Associated Press and other media outlets urged a judge Tuesday to grant access to police videos made shortly after pop singer Justin Bieber's arrest last month on driving under the influence and other charges....
